channel.title: NeroticX 317 Delta
channel.description:
[CENTER][U][SIZE=24pt][FONT=Comic Sans MS]NeroticX 317[/SIZE][/U]
[SIZE=18pt][URL=http://"http://neroticx.enjin.com/"]NeroticX Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/85vviw4jbtluvpq/NeroticXClient.jar"]Neroticx Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://neroticx.enjin.com/members"]Donate[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=18pt]What is our goal?[/SIZE] [SIZE=14pt]Here at NeroticX our staff aim to give the players the oldschool feel of graphics with some of the new items and customized items. We aim to maximize and customize the server for each and every player to satisfy each player.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=18pt]What do we offer?[/SIZE]
[SIZE=14pt]-Custom Items- -Bronze->Dragon whips- -3 Custom Bosses- -Unique home in Al-Kharid- -Stable Economy- -4 unique quests- -Stable XP rate- -Double XP weekend- -Global item protection 12-2PM sat/sun- -Friendly Community- -Active Staff- -Pest Control- -Castle Wars- -7 Wave Jad- -2005->2007 Graphics- -Old school feel- -Hardcore Economy- -Donator Zone- -Working Dwarf Cannon- -Chaotics- -Drygore Defender- -Dragon defender- -Godwars- -MUCH MORE-[/SIZE]
[SIZE=18pt]--MEDIA--[/SIZE]
[SIZE=14pt]Here is a trailer made by a player:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=MDntcEjnRuc[/youtube][/FONT][/CENTER]

item.description:
@darkzelot wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:2, topic:546849”]Crazy bitch and king caves, go way back in the past.

Would love to play this. :P[/quote]

Great to hear This server is hosted 100% free with a separate computer separate IP ect, so no reason for it to go down

–small updates–
tweaking XP and prices in shops
at 10 players is a dp :3
